snippet: The Japanese breakfast at this quiet dining room in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, is a small-scale version of the nine-course omakase dinners that its sister restaurant offers on weekends.
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Okonomi restaurant in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese breakfast at this quiet dining room in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, is a small-scale version of the nine-course omakase dinners that its sister restaurant offers on weekends.

headline.main: At Okonomi, Don’t Look for French Toast
